question: List the project names along with how many employees are assigned to each.
mysql_example: SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(ep.employee_id) FROM projects p LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON p.id = ep.project_id GROUP BY p.id;
sqlite_example: SELECT p.project_name, COUNT(ep.employee_id) FROM projects p LEFT JOIN employee_projects ep ON p.id = ep.project_id GROUP BY p.id;
